p: In conclusion, the highest repellence effects against S. oryzae were recorded by using basil EO with all concentrations and at different exposure times. This effect is related to the chemical composition of basil essential oil containing eugenol, linalool, and estragole. Lavender and basil EOs have the highest mortality effect against rice weevils. Expression of detoxification system of S. oryzae genes was increased in case of using lavender and basil EO. This study recommends using basil and lavender EOs as insecticides and pesticides against S. oryzae as biological control.
